website_summaries.verdict: This leather watch box undercuts the price of competition.
pros: This inexpensive case fits small or large watches, and the lid stays open
For a cheaper option, this is hard to beat
Holds 12 watches has two color options
cons: The ribbon that supports the box lid may lie across some watches when the case is closed

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This watch case was just what I was looking for. At a perfect price it is also beautifully made. I was looking for a case with a clear top to display my watches and also because some of my watches are solar powered and need light in order to function. I am very happy with my purchase and highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch box
customer_reviews.text: Received the box, it is more than the picture shows. Very nice, well done and it is proudly displaying my watches. Excellent way to keep them organized. Excellent quality and finish. Would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Eli Anselmi

customer_reviews.title: the watch box looks good. It has a good finish
customer_reviews.text: the watch box looks good. It has a good finish. fits all the watches well of different shapes. It was a gift to someone special and they loved it. would recommend the product, Its a good buy for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: kbh

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch case.
customer_reviews.text: All my watches fit this and look great in the case. I can easily decide which watch I want to wear every day. The lock is prety much useless, unless you have a young child. I would reccomend to others and buy again if my collection gets larger. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Tea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and stylish watch case
customer_reviews.text: Its been a while I was looking for a watch display box online and in stores and do not want to invest much in it. I found this one on amazon and I am very happy with my purchase. This is really a nice and good quality leather watch box. Perfectly holds all kind of watches. Note: This is NOT a paid review or review for discounted price. I was in need of this product and purchased it for the full price .
customer_reviews.author: Samiksha

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: this is so beautiful the quality is amazing for the price I was shocked it was perfect for husband we got to get rid of all the ugly watch boxes amazing quality great price!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job with style
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer than you might expect for the money. Perfect for organizing and displaying my watches.
customer_reviews.author: Pianoman

customer_reviews.title: Classy alternative to a sock drawer!
customer_reviews.text: I got my case today and was a little concerned because the box had obviously been dropped. However, thanks to the great packaging (A box within a box, within a box) The watch box was unblemished. It appears very well made with no obvious flaws and really looks nice loaded up with my watches, which were previously in a sock drawer. The watch "pillows" are perfect for my metal and leather strapped watches. It displays rather nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: Just some guy in California

customer_reviews.title: this was perfect for him to get them organised
customer_reviews.text: My dad had a load of watches lying around in his closet, this was perfect for him to get them organised. Decent sturdy box, only thing I don't really like is that the lid has no way to keep it from closing other than a single ribbon on the left of the lid, so the lid drops closed freely. Other than that this is a good product and I recommend it if you are looking for a good box to keep your watches protected in.
customer_reviews.author: BarretBoy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product! Terrible Customer Service!!
customer_reviews.text: Below is my unbiased and uncompensated review: Very disappointed when I received the case because it’s poorly made. It looks CHEAP!! The lock doesn’t work. The product’s description is also WRONG. The case certainly does not work with women’s watches because the “pillows” are too BIG. The pillows are also NOT soft, very rigid and made of cardboard and poor quality of synthetic materials. It feels cheap. My wrist is 6.25 inches (15.75 cm) and the case does NOT fit any of my watches. Please see the attached photos. I emailed their customer service about the issues but they did NOT reply. Terrible customer service!! Worse experience with this company. Don’t waste your time and money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the pricw
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a $100 watch box but it is a good one none the less. If you shake it around the watches do move but I’m not sure why anyone would be violently shaking their watch box.
customer_reviews.author: Weezfaz88

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The case is very well designed. The quality is above my expectations. The slots have more than enough space for all types of watched: big faced, slim or wide band. Its a great product. My husband purchased a watch case from another company and complimented mine as the better one. I actually used one of the slots for my nicer rings. I would recommend this item to others. The key and lock is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: T. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Quality Watch Box. Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive way to store my ever growing watch collection. I didn't want to spend an arm and a leg on a watch box. I found this box on Amazon $12-$15. I thought I would give it a try at such a great price. It far exceeded my expectations on quality and value. They slots have removable inserts to keep the watches. The glass top makes it convenient to look without opening. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a quality storage box for their watches or other items.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vinitelli

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with WOMEN'S watches!
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice enough, HOWEVER, NONE of my watches will close around the insert that fits inside the individual compartment. The insert is RIGID so it will NOT compress so that smaller watches can close. I thought it would be ok just to leave the watch unclasped or unbuckled but then they don't sit fully in the individual compartment. They need to SAY in the DESCRIPTION that this is made for MEN'S watches. NOT happy but not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels expensive
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to keep my watches together so I can make a decision on which one to wear without going to different drawers on the jewelry chest. It looks and feels expensive and makes me happy to see them on display.
customer_reviews.author: savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: ignore the negative reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to purchase this at first after reading some of the negative reviews. I still went ahead and purchased it and honestly, those negative reviews have no clue what they are talking about. this case is amazing and gets the job done and it's under 20 bucks!!! i'm not sure why others complained but there is nothing i see bad about this case.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my boyfriend. I have been gifting him watches in the past year and wanted something for him to keep his watches. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality & Realiable , HIGHLY RECOMMEND .
customer_reviews.text: HONESTLY when i purchased this item it didnt have any review or anything so one thing i love about Amazon that lets say i didnt like it i could of returned it BUT i LOVE this item , well packaged , high quality items i was literally debating cause i was afraid it wouldnt be good but it is HIGHLY RECOMMEND shipping was super fast and literally everything is high quality and heavy & i will definitely buy again from this seller 👽🎥 i buy from Amazon Weekly and trust me ive seen bad products and this isnt one of them 💯
customer_reviews.author: Josuel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good enough but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of cheap looking but you get what you pay for- and for $17 it is better than having my boyfriends watches scattered all over our house! Also the pillows that hold that watches are quite large and his watches only fasten around them on the last notch, which is fine for him but I imagine smaller watches wouldn’t fit in here properly. ALSO when you close the box, the ribbon that holds the top the bottom lays inside the box over the watches- I imagine that happens with any watch box but I don’t know because I’ve never owned one before this. Either way, it’s so annoying and looks quite tacky. OverAll reaction : Eh. *shrug*
customer_reviews.author: Hanna Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not the size described.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these watch boxes to use as fund raiser boxes for jewelry I make. I ordered these because in the description it said the slots are 2 inches wide, they are not. My business cards are 2 inches wide and they do not fit. My jewelry is attached to the business card, so I will have to cut all the cards I place in this box . They do seem sturdy and well built, just not the size stated.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Be Sure to Get the Real McCoy!
customer_reviews.text: Don't make the mistake of purchasing this look a like 12 pc case for the SONGMICS which is an excellent product to protect your watches. The quality of this case is CHEAP, the pillows have not padding on the sides causing the watches to roll around inside the case. The lid has a black ribbon stop instead of a metal brace to hold the lid up. It's almost not worth the return.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Good box for money
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good box and the material inside feels good beside the strip of material attaching top half with the bottom half. I know it is to hold the lid but could have done with a shorter string. I have to physically push the string inside while closing the box. Overall nice but if some design changes can be made, would have been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Samir Shr

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these for my husband as an early anniversary gift. He collects watches. He loves it. He is able to add all of his watches for easy storage, while being able to view selection. One glass was broken upon delivery, but seller immediately sent another one while my return was pending.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: A great looking watch case and well made. It has a glass window, which for the offering price is a quality you only would expect to find in a much more expensive item. The unit is very sturdy and is made of good quality materials. I am very impressed with the overall quality of the product and an entirely reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Emotive Pen

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother
customer_reviews.text: The cushions are stiff and do not fit my watches; Anne Klein, Seiko, Tissot, all women's. Very unhappy with this product. And I don't like that the product name is emboldened on the glass. Loved the Songmics brand and ordered another one. Highly recommend that brand - not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bradford

customer_reviews.title: great for display but hate the cushions
customer_reviews.text: Feels like a quality product on the outside with what feels like a glass casing. The only problem I have with it are the cushions for the watches. They can’t be manipulated so the watches can strap on so some watches are loose in the casing. Also, the cushions feel real cheap. But hey, for the price point, it ain’t that bad.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: What a beautiful and useful watch box
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful watch box, it's very well made, the stich in is not just just holding it together it's a beautiful accent to the box on the leather. The glass on the top makes it easy to see your watches, I also use it for my bracelets. So happy that I bought this is a wonderful addition to my jewelry box that keeps everything in nice neat order and free from the dust around her. I bought two one for me and one for a gift, I don't think anyone would be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: P. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Designed by someone who doesn't wear watches
customer_reviews.text: The watch cushions are absurdly large. I have a 7.5 inch wrist and my watch bands are too small to fit without crushing the cushions an alarming amount. Also, the slots and cushions are very narrow. I can't use it for any watches over 40mm.
customer_reviews.author: OCD

customer_reviews.title: It is slotted for 12 watches and has a little pillow for each watch
customer_reviews.text: One minor flaw is the ribbon on the inside corner that keeps the lid from flipping completely backwards. While I understand the concept, it's hard to close it without ribbon sticking out of the side of the box. Otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Hutchen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for LOL dolls.  Nicely made.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my daughter's LOL dolls. They fit nicely in the little slots. They display beautifully in this box. I plan to buy another one. Even my husband wants me to buy one for his watches! Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: XYZ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I think the case is very nice although the strap gets in the way. I think a hinge would of been much better but for the price, you can’t beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Material and space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband from my son side as a Father’s Day gift and he really like it he has so many watches and all fit in it perfectly .. material is very nice and colour lock is very easy to open and close
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I love my case all my watches fit in it no ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my case all my watches fit in it no problem. I seen some other post that people commented that women were not able to get there watches to close together on the insert in the case. I did had the same problem with watches not being able clasp together on the insert but it wasn't a big deal for me, my watches fit in the cubes well and zi am able to close watch case and lock it with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box!
customer_reviews.text: This watch box is great! I am now starting a watch collection. I like that it has the see through glass to look at your watches. It's also very easy to open. It also looks fancy and comes with a key to make sure no one opens up the box. By that I mean my kids because it is not a very secure lock. It keeps my kids from wanting to try them on. It has plenty of space from the glass to the watch holder enough for people who like big watches to not worry about the lid not closing. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: There is a logo on the front. lol
customer_reviews.text: Bought this box for my husband's watch collection for his birthday. It is a beautifully made box with nice material. It was easy to store his watches and other jewelry inside. There is a small logo on the clear top but it didn't really bother either of us.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Shopping

customer_reviews.title: So great as soon as I got it I bought another!
customer_reviews.text: If you need a great watch case, and don't want to spend new watch money, this is the case for you. Excellent value for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: I like it; it is a very good value for ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it; it is a very good value for money. Only thing I would say is the string on one side of the case that keeps the lid upright when it is opened. The strap is necessary, but I don't know where and how I should keep the strap, because it stays over a couple of watches. I am sorry to be picky, but I believe it would be much better if the strap is properly kept somewhere unseen.
customer_reviews.author: Shigetada N.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this for myself when i realized i had a watch problem. This fits all my large faced watches as well. The glass on the lip is set higher than the watches so no worry about scratches or breaking glass . The quality is durable and looks good with my dark furniture. The company followed up with me to ensure my satisfaction. I will absolutely be buying a second box as I’ve already run outa room with the current box.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is beautiful. I have a large watch collection and have been keeping them in their perspective boxes up until now. This thing has been a god send. I'm very happy I went ahead and purchased it. I was afraid that it would look too masculine for my vanity, so I gold foiled it; it's fabulous. If you own a lot of watches, don't hesitate to buy this. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous! !!!
customer_reviews.text: This box for watches and jewelry arrived better than I expected. It's made well and it's beautiful. I love that it can lock also. It arrived on time and packaged nicely. The price is good and worth it. My husband puts his collection of watches and other jewlery in and everything has its own place. This product is great and would also make a great gift idea for that special someone!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Osten

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea for a Watch Aficionado
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift, I checked when I received it, before wrapping. It is a nice size, well made, slip in a drawer or leave on a dresser. The recipient loved it and started using it as soon as received. Makes a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: PeggyG

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR WOMENS WATCHES
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit women's watches. The casing is nice but unfortunately it does not fit any of my watches. It should be called Men's leather watch box....sux but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Tulips24

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Product does the job, but does not feel sturdy. Pillows were not tight fitting in case. Material separating the pillows had the feel of shoe box cardboard. Faux leather cheap looking. If you are looking for a nice display box for your collection, this is not the best choice. This would better suited as a secondary protective case for your watches.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: but they still work fine unclipped. Mine clip perfect onto the inserts and ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this case is definitely worth the price. My wife and I both use it, with hers in one row and mine in the other. Her wrist being so small, she can't clip her watches on the inserts, but they still work fine unclipped. Mine clip perfect onto the inserts and don't move around at all. For the price, the case looks fashionable for the price paid and the door latches nicely and easily. Would definitely recommend buying for your watch storage or even bracelets! The window makes it nice to take a quick peek inside.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality case
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied! Good quality case and even though most of my watches have the larger dial/face, they fit well and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Manny K.

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I think I am reviewing the product and not the company...but either way both are awesome. The box is fantastic. I think I paid $16 for it and I think it looks like it would be worth more. As for everything else...it arrived on-time and was as describe. I would reorder it and I would order again for Ohuhu.
customer_reviews.author: CMGLV

customer_reviews.title: Decent watch box but...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this watch box but some sort of handle to lift it open easily would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Scottb219

customer_reviews.title: It's nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my dad for Father's day since he has a ton of watches just dumped in a drawer. He loves it! It keeps everything organized. The only thing I didn't too like was that it was super dusty when it arrived. I get it, it comes with the packaging but if I had sent it straight to him as a gift, he would've been upset.
customer_reviews.author: Brin KS.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend since he has so many watches but nothing to store them in. LOVE the quality, the number of watches it holds, the fact it can lock and a clear top. It is overall a GREAT watch case. He loved it and put his watching in them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: RENEE

customer_reviews.title: Lock difficult to lock
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of the smaller size edition. Both good. This bigger one has a lock that's difficult to get and keep closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Z.

customer_reviews.title: Watch organizer has an unpleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: I took one star because of the smell of a case.
customer_reviews.author: Nilyu

customer_reviews.title: It’s succeasfully medium
customer_reviews.text: The watch cushions are pretty small and they reall won’t display a watch nicely. It’s fine.. it was cheap and it gives me a place to put my watches and actually see them to choose from. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case better than expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice case better than expected for the price. It's very sturdy but the material in the inside isn't soft, but I don't mind. Arrived earlier than expected. I will be buying one for my boyfriend who liked the case too.
customer_reviews.author: Gogo24

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended
customer_reviews.text: This review is long overdue. Purchased this for my husband as a gift and he loved it. It’s a nice beginning to start his watch collection. Decent quality and it looks nice. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: knikita

customer_reviews.title: Convenient for securely storing watches
customer_reviews.text: It's a carefully designed box, with white stitches on a black PU leather, have a fashionable look, holds up to 12 watches and a window lid allows to see the inside of the box. It is a convenient way of securely storing the watches. I keep it on my dresser along with jewelry boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Cactus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I'm actually using this for heartworm medicine for my 4 dogs and cat. It's perfect once I removed the holders in the compartments. About the same cost as a plastic container but much nicer looking. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: REDABARTH

customer_reviews.title: Great watch case
customer_reviews.text: Great product pretty well made, no issues with the product at all, don't mind the bad reviews most are because of damage in shipping which s#$t happens. Take a chance it's a great price on a great product I would recommend 100%
customer_reviews.author: Gary M Zahn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I really like it!! It was a gift to someone but I was quite impressed with the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer jackson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: All my watches conveniently displayed in a nice box...couldn't ask for more! Would have been 5 stars if the ribbon on the side didn't sit in the case awkwardly when shut and if the compartments were a bit more flush. Still very nice and would have loved the option of dark brown faux leather too.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Watch storage/Display
customer_reviews.text: Really like this display storage for watches. Looks to be well made, looks good and appears to be durable. I would rate it high but the truth of many items is told over time and with this item if it has flaws that appear later I will report that but at this times it is A+++++
customer_reviews.author: robert e

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: Loved the box, it looked like the one I would get at Things to Remember store. Fake leather but feels real. Stich in was good and the watch holders were nice. Real glass cover and came with a lock. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: im a watch person so I needed something nice to hold all my watches
customer_reviews.text: im a watch person so I needed something nice to hold all my watches. Beautiful box and holds all my watches perfectly. The only complaint is the logo on the bottom right corner of the glass window...kind of tacky, but overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Denise N.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted, fits watches of all widths.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful watch case. The quality of the craftsman ship (the finish) is really good. I have watches of many widths and I had no issues fitting any of them in the compartments here. The hinge on the box keeps it closed securely and is easy to open. I could not completely loop some of my watches around the cushions so I just set them in the box without closing the straps and they sit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Smaran

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a relative of my who has dozens of watches laying around, but it did fit the most valuable to them. Although fair warning that wider wrist straps or metal straps may halve difficulty fitting in. And smaller band watches will be less likely to wrap completely around the inner case padding (the watch holders). Overall very nice and feels that way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, ordered one as a gift and a second for myself.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: watches do not fit
customer_reviews.text: Completely useless.. tried loading with various watches with different bands and cases.. most do not fit and the stiff cushion isn't pliable enough to close most of my watch so they would just flop around in there and not sit level.. really useless design and not worth returning.. good price, hoped it would work.. but very disappointed in spite of all the good reviews.. how are you guys using this thing?
customer_reviews.author: ron2you

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you're paying for the case is awesome. I love how it looks. Super fancy
customer_reviews.author: Casandra

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: he loves it. need to purchase 4 more. he is a watch freak...
customer_reviews.author: Cerrone Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and it was dirty and some parts were scratched up. Definitely not clean or neat. *Note: Seller did work with us on this, and we are satisfied with their efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Great for Men's watches.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case to store my wife's watches that I have recently purchased for her. The case is great and displays the watches nicely. However the issue that we ran into was the cushion inserts were too large for for the band of a women's watch. They fit great for men's watches. If there were a smaller size option or a way for the cushion inserts to be adjustable this product would be an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: CapTJack

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: No issues so far with this watch box. Would buy another if my collection grows to more than 12 watches.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Kang

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES buying watches, and he always wears ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES buying watches, and he always wears one until he finds another one he likes, and then he puts the old one away. For the longest time, we just had watches lying around everywhere. With this purchase, it has helped him organize them and now he chooses different ones for all occasions.
customer_reviews.author: j.Alfstad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch case!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice watch case for the money. Great build quality for sure. Built in China but what else can you do for $16? Great way to organize and display your watch collection. I bought two of them and am going to order two more!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the watch box I've wanted one for a long time. I have a real "thing" for watches and what a nice way to store and display them. This a thumbs up at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: CARROLL ASTEMBORSKI

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Glass part was dusty and hand fingerprints. Otherwise looks great and fits all the watches i have
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and sturdy watch case. Materials are great quality and it’s a great value for the cost. I had been eyeing it for a while and I’m glad I finally purchased it. I have a small wrist size but the little forms you use to put your watches on worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina L Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Not the best case on the market but it is acceptable for its price.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best case on the market but it is acceptable for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at a very affordable price! It is a great way to organize and admire my watch collection. I liked it so much that I should be receiving my third watch box today!
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: really beautiful case for my boyfriend's watches that I bought him for christmas! the watches fit snug around the inserts. I really didn't like the logo that was on the glass but i was able to scratch it off without damaging the glass itself! Overall really nice case for a beginner in collecting watches!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Cudmore

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and fast delivery!! My husband loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a smaller box at an outlet store for almost 10x this price. Hub expressed a desire for his collection and I found this. Quick delivery and in time for Father's Day. It is beautiful and the large watch I bought him fit perfectly. It was easy to place the watch on the holder as well.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Emmett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for my boyfriend because I gave him a watch to go with it. His collection was getting rather large and he loved it. It does feel a little cheap but for the price you pay its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Reagan Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: NOT APPROPRIATE FOR LARGE MEN'S WATCHES
customer_reviews.text: box quality is fine,WAY TOO SMALL FOR MEN'S WATCHES, it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: jesse

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bery nicely made, just dont put company sticker on the glass, was a bit hard to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Husbands rotating watch holder broke and I bought this to replace and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Tirado

customer_reviews.title: No complaints at the moment
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as directed. Packaged well with no issues. Fits all my watches well, even the ones with larger faces. I have a smaller wrist so the watches don’t go all the way around the cushion but that’s ok with me. I put some left over links to each watch under the cushions. We shall see how well it holds up under normal wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: ESW

customer_reviews.title: Great watch holder
customer_reviews.text: Gave this out as a gift and ended up buying one for myself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive watch case
customer_reviews.text: This is my first watch case and I’m very happy with it. It looks nice on the dresser and displays my watches nightly.
customer_reviews.author: R Hubris

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not the best but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift and actually want one for myself now. The quality is not the best but you get what you pay for. All in all I think its a good buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: This product is crap. The "pillows" are not soft and are actually cardboard covered in some fabric and don't even fit the slots properly. You end up with watches that flop around inside the slots. Another issue with the cardboard "pillows" is that they're too big where it's difficult to secure the watch strap around it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ferma

customer_reviews.title: For men, not women.
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch holder for men's watches, however I purchased 3, (for myself , my daughter & a friend ) for Christmas . The pads are definitely too big for woman's watches. One of the photos showing the product has woman's watches , so I mistakingly thought woman's watches would fit. However, it is a nice case, I can take some of the pads out & put bracelets in. My daughter said her fiancé's watches fit perfectely, so it is geared toward a mans wrist size.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Just like the photo
customer_reviews.text: It is beatiful, excelent cuality. It’s really cheap for what it is
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for my watches. Not expensive but good quality and it looks great on my bureau.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: All of them fit just fine in the case
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for my husband's watches. His watches are mostly casual, sport type that are larger in size. All of them fit just fine in the case. He likes having all his watches neatly in the box with the glass top. It looks very nice to leave sitting out on the dresser too. Very pleased with it! I think I will get him a second one for the rest of his collection!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy....love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife watch collection and she absolutely loves it. It look so fancy and expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tenisha Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good watch case I would definitely buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch case I've had over a year that is not feeling it's actually glass not plastic very nice
customer_reviews.author: BigAng

customer_reviews.title: 1 year usage and counting
customer_reviews.text: For the price is superb. The interior is made of cardboard but it works fine. The buckle is chromed not stainless steel cut it won't rust in 1 year usage.
customer_reviews.author: SirValak

customer_reviews.title: Had a bit of dust particles on the clear cover that wasn't exactly easy to wipe off
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my husband. Looks exactly as pictured. Had a bit of dust particles on the clear cover that wasn't exactly easy to wipe off. Comes with a key, which I like. Decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love almost everything about this box except the placement of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love almost everything about this box except the placement of the company logo. It's kind of big (in my opinion) and takes away from that nice clean look. Other than that I love the box. It's a great size, love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Kianna

customer_reviews.title: I like this item
customer_reviews.text: I like this item, however, there is a bad odor that it has, and could possibly be from the glue that is used. I had to keep it out and open for a month for the smell to dissipate. Otherwise, it's a handy storage unit I feel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The lid is a bit filmsy
customer_reviews.text: The only complain is the lid is not close perfectly! You will have to pull it a bit forward to be able to close it and use the hinge lock.
customer_reviews.author: Al R'Charoen

product_meta.title: Ohuhu Watch Box, 12 Slot Watch Case PU Leather Real Glass Lid Watch Display Case, Watch Organizer Watches Storage Case, for Men and Women Birthday Presents Grey
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Black High Grade PU Leather surface, Metal lock catch designed for one-hand easy opening, no need keys. velvet interior and pillows. No logo printed

UNIQUE DESIGN: 12 watch slots with removable velvet pillows. Each watch cushion holds a small or large watch neatly in place . There is plenty of space between the lid and cushions to accommodate watches of all size and to well protect your watches against scratches
LARGE REAL GLASS LID: Real glass lid protects your watches to the fullest, and offers you an open view of the displayed watches.Box Size: 11.92" L x 7.99" W x 3.14" H

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL: Suit for watches, hairpin, cuff links, brooches, jewelry, spare links, rings, earrings, bracelets and necklaces and other stuff. Is great for personal use, shop display and home decoration

NICE GIFT IDEA:With elegant appearance and considerate design, this watch case is a great gift for Valentine's Day, Father's Day, graduation, wdding, Christmas, birthday, promotion, vacation, retirement, etc.
